description.zh-cn: 一部最初在“超级大本营”论坛连载的中国网络漫画，后被改编为动画。作品以动物拟人化的方式，从中华人民共和国政府的立场出发，描绘了中国近现代史以及相关的国际关系。
description.en: A Chinese webcomic, later adapted into an animation, that was first serialized on the 'Super Camp' forum. It depicts the modern history of China and related international relations from the perspective of the government of the People's Republic of China, using anthropomorphic animals.

description.zh-cn: 中国网络漫画《那年那兔那些事儿》的作者。
description.en: The author of the Chinese webcomic 'Year Hare Affair'.

description.zh-cn: 一篇由“野风之狼”写作的网络长贴，是《那年那兔那些事儿》漫画前期的部分素材来源。
description.en: A long online post written by 'Ye Feng Zhi Lang', which served as part of the source material for the early stages of the 'Year Hare Affair' comic.

description.zh-cn: 网络文章《小白兔的光荣往事》的作者。
description.en: The author of the online article 'The Glorious Past of the Little White Rabbit'.

description.zh-cn: 在《那年那兔那些事儿》中以“兔子”的形象出现，代表中国共产党领导下的中国。该形象被描绘为致力于维护世界和平，性格温顺但被激怒后也会反击。
description.en: Represented as a 'rabbit' in 'Year Hare Affair', symbolizing China under the leadership of the Communist Party. The character is portrayed as committed to world peace, with a gentle nature but capable of fighting back when provoked.

description.zh-cn: 在《那年那兔那些事儿》中以“秃子”的形象出现，其形象源于时任总统蒋中正的发型，以象征与“兔子”（中华人民共和国）同文同种。
description.en: Represented as 'Baldy' in 'Year Hare Affair', an image derived from the hairstyle of then-President Chiang Kai-shek, symbolizing a shared cultural and ethnic origin with the 'Rabbit' (People's Republic of China).

description.zh-cn: 中华民国前总统、中国国民党总裁。其光头发型是《那年那兔那些事儿》中“秃子”形象的来源。
description.en: Former President of the Republic of China and Director-General of the Kuomintang. His bald hairstyle was the source for the 'Baldy' character in 'Year Hare Affair'.

description.zh-cn: 《那年那兔那些事儿》中涉及的重要历史事件。作者曾因制作相关动画剧集遇到阻力，并被人以“破坏中韩关系”为由举报。
description.en: A major historical event featured in 'Year Hare Affair'. The author faced resistance and was reported for 'damaging China-South Korea relations' when producing animated episodes about the war.

description.zh-cn: 在《那年那兔那些事儿》中以“南棒”的形象出现，代表韩国。
description.en: Represented as the 'South Stick' in 'Year Hare Affair', symbolizing South Korea.

nodes.id: 中国共产主义青年团中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Youth League of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的青年组织。其官方微博曾推荐《那年那兔那些事儿》动画版。
description.en: The youth wing of the Communist Party of China. Its official Weibo account recommended the animated version of 'Year Hare Affair'.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军政治工作部文工团

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军政治工作部文工团
中国人民解放军陆军政治工作部文工团电视艺术中心

description.zh-cn: 参与制作《那年那兔那些事儿》第四、五季动画的机构。其加入帮助解决了动画播出时遇到的困难。
description.en: An organization involved in the production of the fourth and fifth seasons of the 'Year Hare Affair' animation. Its participation helped resolve difficulties encountered during the broadcast.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央国家安全委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央国家安全委员会
en: National Security Commission of the Communist Party of China Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的国家安全事务决策和议事协调机构。其下属的“小安工作室”曾联合制作《那年那兔那些事儿》香港特别篇。
description.en: The decision-making and coordinating body for national security affairs of the Communist Party of China. Its 'Xiao'an Studio' co-produced the Hong Kong special episode of 'Year Hare Affair'.

nodes.id: 四川省卫生健康委员会

zh-cn: 四川省卫生健康委员会
四川省卫生健康宣教中心

description.zh-cn: 中国四川省的卫生健康主管机构。其下属的宣教中心曾联合制作《那年那兔那些事儿》抗疫特别篇。
description.en: The health authority of Sichuan Province, China. Its health education center co-produced the anti-epidemic special episode of 'Year Hare Affair'.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的机关报。曾联合制作《那年那兔那些事儿》特别篇，为电影《我和我的父辈》作宣传。
description.en: The official newspaper of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China. It co-produced a special episode of 'Year Hare Affair' to promote the film 'My Country, My Parents'.

nodes.id: 反对逃犯条例修订草案运动

zh-cn: 反对逃犯条例修订草案运动

description.zh-cn: 2019年在香港爆发的大规模社会运动。在《那年那兔那些事儿》动画中，示威者被描绘成“蟑螂”的形象。
description.en: A large-scale social movement that erupted in Hong Kong in 2019. In the 'Year Hare Affair' animation, protesters were depicted as 'cockroaches'.

description.zh-cn: 逆光飞行（本名林超）是《那年那兔那些事儿》的创作者，于2011年6月开始在网络论坛上连载该漫画。
description.en: Ni Guang Fei Xing (real name Lin Chao) is the creator of 'Year Hare Affair', and began serializing the comic on an online forum in June 2011.

description.zh-cn: 《那年那兔那些事儿》的前期素材部分来源于网络文章《小白兔的光荣往事》。
description.en: The early material for 'Year Hare Affair' was partly sourced from the online article 'The Glorious Past of the Little White Rabbit'.

description.zh-cn: “野风之狼”是网络文章《小白兔的光荣往事》的作者。
description.en: 'Ye Feng Zhi Lang' is the author of the online article 'The Glorious Past of the Little White Rabbit'.

description.zh-cn: 《那年那兔那些事儿》中代表中华民国的“秃子”形象，其来源是蒋中正的光头发型。
description.en: The 'Baldy' character representing the Republic of China in 'Year Hare Affair' was inspired by Chiang Kai-shek's bald hairstyle.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争是《那年那兔那些事儿》中描绘的重要历史事件之一。
description.en: The Korean War is one of the major historical events depicted in 'Year Hare Affair'.

description.zh-cn: 该作品关于朝鲜战争的内容曾被人以“破坏中韩关系”为由向中国文化部门举报。
description.en: The work's content regarding the Korean War was reported to Chinese cultural authorities on the grounds that it 'damaged China-South Korea relations'.

relationships.source: 中国共产主义青年团中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共青团中央的官方微博曾发文推荐《那年那兔那些事儿》动画版。
description.en: The official Weibo account of the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League of China once posted to recommend the animated version of 'Year Hare Affair'.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军陆军政治工作部文工团

description.zh-cn: 该机构作为制作方之一参与了《那年那兔那些事儿》第四季和第五季动画的制作，其加入帮助解决了动画播出时遇到的困难。
description.en: This organization participated as a producer in the fourth and fifth seasons of the 'Year Hare Affair' animation, and its involvement helped resolve difficulties encountered during broadcast.

relationships.target: 反对逃犯条例修订草案运动

description.zh-cn: 在一部特别篇动画中，《那年那兔那些事儿》将香港反修例运动的示威者描绘为“蟑螂”的负面形象。
description.en: In a special animated episode, 'Year Hare Affair' depicted the protesters of the Hong Kong Anti-Extradition Law Amendment Bill Movement with the negative image of 'cockroaches'.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央国家安全委员会

description.zh-cn: 以“小安工作室”名义联合制作了《那年那兔那些事儿－－香港特别篇》。
description.en: Co-produced the 'Year Hare Affair -- Hong Kong Special Episode' under the name 'Xiao'an Studio'.

relationships.source: 四川省卫生健康委员会

description.zh-cn: 其下属的宣教中心联合制作了《那年那兔那些事儿－－抗疫的故事》特别篇，以宣传抗疫和疫苗接种。
description.en: Its affiliated education center co-produced the special episode 'Year Hare Affair -- The Story of Fighting the Epidemic' to promote anti-pandemic efforts and vaccination.

description.zh-cn: 联合制作了《那年那兔那些事儿－－我的父辈》特别篇，为电影《我和我的父辈》作宣传。
description.en: Co-produced the special episode 'Year Hare Affair -- My Forefathers' to promote the film 'My Country, My Parents'.
